name: dev-tool-box
description: CLI and other JS tools for developers available in commonjs

scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run release:publish
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run release:publish

author: coryrobinson42@gmail.com
